hero.title: Authentic Mexican. <primary>Delivered fast.</primary>
hero.desc: From street‑style tacos to slow‑cooked specialties. Order in seconds, reserve a table instantly, and track your delivery in real time — all in one place.
hero.imageAlt: Colorful tacos platter with fresh ingredients and vibrant salsa

card.title: Fresh Daily
card.desc: We source ingredients from local markets every morning

quality.title: Chef‑crafted quality
quality.desc: Fresh ingredients and seasonal menus prepared by expert chefs.

speed.title: Lightning fast delivery
speed.desc: Direct kitchen to doorstep, no third‑party delays.

service.title: Exceptional service
service.desc: Live tracking, instant confirmations, and 24/7 support.

about.title: Our Story
about.content: Founded with a passion for authentic Mexican cuisine, we bring the flavors of Mexico to your table with modern convenience and traditional recipes.

faster.title: Faster than delivery apps
faster.desc: Direct from our kitchen to your door

fees.title: No hidden fees
fees.desc: What you see is what you pay

chef.title: Chef-crafted quality
chef.desc: Made with care by expert chefs

events.heading: Events & Catering
events.desc: We organize special events and catering for large groups. From birthdays to corporate events.

q1.question: What is the minimum group size for events?
q1.answer: Our minimum group size for events is 20 people. For smaller groups, we recommend regular reservations.

q2.question: Do you offer vegetarian and vegan options?
q2.answer: Yes, we have a complete menu of vegetarian and vegan options. We can also customize menus according to your dietary needs.

cta.title: Ready to Taste the Difference?
cta.desc: Join thousands of satisfied customers who choose Cantina for authentic Mexican flavors.

logo.heading: Trusted by local businesses and food lovers

values.heading: Our Values
values.desc: We're committed to quality, sustainability, and community.

value.reorderDesc: Quick reordering for your favorite meals
value.trustedDesc: Join our community of satisfied customers

how.heading: How It Works
how.desc: Simple steps to delicious Mexican food

step1.title: Choose Your Meal
step1.desc: Browse our menu and select your favorite dishes

step2.title: Place Your Order
step2.desc: Order online or call us for quick service

seo.title: Cantina Mariachi – Authentic Mexican, Modern Experience
seo.description: Order online in seconds, reserve instantly, and track your delivery live. Authentic Mexican cuisine delivered fast.
